archdesc.runner: Digital Library and Archives, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Digital Libraries and Archives, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
did.physdesc: This collection is 0.1 cubic feet and is a one folder manuscript.
did.abstract: Robert Edminton was a Washington County, Virginia, land and slave owner. The collection consists an inventory which lists the amount and value of his land, farm, and slaves.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from The Robert Edminton Papers must be obtained from the Digital Libraries and Archives, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Robert Edminton Papers, 1815, Ms88-077, Digital Library and Archives, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains an inventory lising the amount and value of Robert Edminton's land, farm and slaves in 1815.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This manuscript contains only one document and is located within a collection of one-folder manuscripts. These manuscripts are organized in numerical order according to their manuscript number.
